Description: This template creates one connection of type 'Cluster' for a given stream instance in the specified project

Profile.Description: Secret Manager Profile that contains the Atlas Programmatic keys

WorkspaceName.Description: Human-readable label that identifies the stream workspace

ConnectionName.Description: Human-readable label that identifies the stream connection

ClusterName.Description: Name of the cluster configured for this connection

DbRole.Description: The name of the role to use. Can be a built in role or a custom role
